patterns: What is his experience in AI?
responses: He has done much work in NLP, Deep Learning, Visual AI(Open cv) for 1.5+ year. He has created many intelligent applications to solve complex problems.

patterns: Can you tell me about his fyp project?
responses:
Master's FYP was Sign to Speech a progressive web application that not only included full-stack development but also the AI integration, ML Engineering and Data Science to study, analyze pre-process the pictorial data and to make predictions on it.
The general idea is that the web application can be run on any platform and it can access the camera device there. It will capture the camera feed and provide it to ML model for prediction. The output of this model is then used for speech synthesis by the system and is also recorded as history by the app.
